title: Beckenham
summary: Beckenham (/ˈbɛkənəm/) is a town in Greater London, England, within the London Borough of Bromley and the historic county of Kent. It is located 8.4 miles (13.5 km) south-east of Charing Cross, situated north of Elmers End and Eden Park, east of Penge, south of Lower Sydenham and Bellingham, and west of Bromley and Shortlands. Its population at the 2011 census counted 46,844 inhabitants.[2]
